mapper.select: select IMEI_id, IMEI_number, IMEI_status,gdgt_id,flag, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark_1, remark_2 from supplymarketing.gd_imei where IMEI_id = #{imeiId}
select IMEI_id, IMEI_number, IMEI_status, gdgt_id,flag,create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark_1, remark_2 from supplymarketing.gd_imei limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into supplymarketing.gd_imei(IMEI_number, IMEI_status, gdgt_id, flag, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time, remark_1, remark_2) values (#{imeiNumber}, #{imeiStatus}, #{gdgt_id}, #{flag}, #{createBy}, #{updateBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remark1}, #{remark2})
mapper.update:
update supplymarketing.gd_imei
IMEI_number = #{imeiNumber},
IMEI_status = #{imeiStatus},
create_by = #{createBy},
update_by = #{updateBy},
and gdgt_id = #{gdgtId}
and flag = #{flag}
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remark_1 = #{remark1},
remark_2 = #{remark2},
where IMEI_id = #{imeiId}
